Entry.JapaneseText: 心を静める薬、鎮魂錠か……
Entry.EnglishText: The Requiem Pastille, which can soothe the heart...

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな薬も効かなかったらしいが、 これなら<Eugene>を鎮められるのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: No other medicines had any effect, so will this really be able to calm down <Eugene>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、秘薬ってぐらいだからな。どんな荒れ狂う心も 鎮めちまうんじゃねえか？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it is a miracle cure. Wouldn't it be able to calm down any furious heart?

Entry.JapaneseText: それが本当なら、まったく、すごい薬だぜ。 な、<Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: If it is the real deal, then that'd make it one of the best medicines. Right, Hilda?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。あんたも少し分けてもらったら？ その方が静かでいいわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. Shall we give some to you too? That way, things would be nice and quiet.
